comment: Thanks for shipping me damaged goods and then expecting me to pay rush fees to get my items before the holidays ! !
amr:
# ::snt Thanks for shipping me damaged goods and then expecting me to pay rush fees to get my items before the holidays ! !
(t / thank-01
      :mode expressive
      :ARG0 (ii / i)
      :ARG1 (y / you)
      :ARG2 (a / and
            :op1 (s / ship-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (g / good
                        :ARG1-of (d / damage-01))
                  :ARG2 ii)
            :op2 (e / expect-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (p / pay-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (f / fee
                              :mod (r / rush-01))
                        :ARG3 (g2 / get-01
                              :ARG0 ii
                              :ARG1 (ii2 / item
                                    :poss ii)
                              :time (b / before
                                    :op1 (h / holiday)))
                        :time (t2 / then)))))

comment: We're sorry to hear about what happened , Kim . Have you already reached out to our team at <URL> ? - Kinga
amr:

      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (s2 / sorry-01
                  :ARG1 (w / we)
                  :ARG2 (h / hear-01
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (e / event)))
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Kim")))
      :snt2 (r / reach-03

                  :name (n2 / name

            :ARG2 (t / team
